Reviews.Title: Truly awesome for the price
Reviews.Author: Lane N Copley
Reviews.Content: Please remember when I tell you about this camera that I got it cheap.I use this camera (and every camera) as an advanced point-and-shoot type.  I do no special photos except perhaps attempting some night shots;  I am rarely disappointed with the results.  The battery lasts a long time in photo mode;  I haven't had need to find out how long it lasts in video mode.  My 16GB card has never been filled even after a three-week vacation to nature's wonderland (Lassen National Volcanic Park), which is saying something.Can't recommend it enough.
